00054 template<unsigned ELEMENT_DIM, unsigned SPACE_DIM = ELEMENT_DIM>
00055 class AbstractCardiacCellFactory
00056 {
00057 private:
00061     AbstractTetrahedralMesh<ELEMENT_DIM,SPACE_DIM>* mpMesh;
00062 
00067     HeartGeometryInformation<SPACE_DIM>* mpHeartGeometryInformation;
00068 
00069 protected:
00071     boost::shared_ptr<ZeroStimulus> mpZeroStimulus;
00073     boost::shared_ptr<AbstractIvpOdeSolver> mpSolver;
00074 
00075 public:
00085     virtual AbstractCardiacCell* CreateCardiacCellForNode(unsigned nodeIndex);
00086 
00092     virtual AbstractCardiacCell* CreateCardiacCellForTissueNode(unsigned nodeIndex)=0;
00093 
00102     virtual void FinaliseCellCreation(std::vector< AbstractCardiacCell* >* pCellsDistributed,
00103                                       unsigned lo, unsigned hi);
00104 
00109     virtual void FillInCellularTransmuralAreas();
00110 
00114     virtual unsigned GetNumberOfCells();
00115 
00121     AbstractCardiacCellFactory(boost::shared_ptr<AbstractIvpOdeSolver> pSolver = boost::shared_ptr<AbstractIvpOdeSolver>(new EulerIvpOdeSolver));
00125     virtual ~AbstractCardiacCellFactory();
00126 
00130     void SetMesh(AbstractTetrahedralMesh<ELEMENT_DIM,SPACE_DIM>* pMesh);
00131 
00135     AbstractTetrahedralMesh<ELEMENT_DIM,SPACE_DIM>* GetMesh();
00136

00143 
00147     HeartGeometryInformation<SPACE_DIM>* GetHeartGeometryInformation();

00149 };
